posts.title: Key Insight #1
posts.content: look, if you want to get rich with ai in 2025, you need to understand this one thing - it's not about the technology, it's about the business model

posts.title: Key Insight #2
posts.content: i've built multiple seven-figure ai agencies and i'm going to show you exactly how to do it

posts.title: Key Insight #3
posts.content: every single business needs ai now but they don't know how to implement it

overallAssessment: Liam Ottley as 'The Opportunity Architect' uses 62% YOU-focused communication.

brandProfile.uniqueValue: Provides unique perspective and proven frameworks for success.

psychologicalTriggers.description: Creates immediate action through 100% urgency language
examples: look, if you want to get rich with ai in 2025, you need to understand this one thing - it's not about the technology, it's about the business model
every single business needs ai now but they don't know how to implement it
most people think you need to be a developer
i started with zero coding knowledge

psychologicalTriggers.description: Establishes credibility through 2.7% I-focused expertise sharing
examples: i built a simple ai tool for real estate agents, gave it away free, then upsold them on the full system
Your future self will thank you
Your future self will thank you

transformationNarrative.beforeState: Confused about AI opportunities, unsure how to monetize, competing on price in saturated markets
transformationNarrative.afterState: Running profitable AI agency with recurring revenue, clear positioning, systematic client acquisition
journey: Identify high-value problems AI can solve
Package AI capabilities as business solutions
promises: Create recurring revenue with AI services
evidence: Active community of AI agency owners

missionVision.mission: Help ambitious entrepreneurs build AI automation agencies from zero to $30k/month in 90 days
missionVision.vision: A new generation of AI-first agencies delivering 10x results with automation, not headcount
beliefs: AI agencies are the next gold rush
